entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
